snippet: Trompe l’oeil wallpaper and screens by Deborah Bowness feature prints that supply ample character but take up minimal space.
abstract: Deborah Bowness, who makes trompe l'oeil wallpaper and screens, introduces her latest line of wallpaper featuring prints of chairs.
lead_paragraph: Trompe l’oeil wallpaper and screens by Deborah Bowness feature prints that supply ample character but take up minimal space.

headline.seo: Trompe L’oeil Wall Screens and Scenic Panels
headline.main: Filling a Room, but Not Its Space
headline.print_headline: Filling a Room, but Not Its Space
